page.title: 11STORIES AND TALES IN CHARD
page.content: Chard is a small town with many strange secrets.The one which puzzles most people is how one summer ten children were killed in a strange way. The undertaker was so upset that he killed himself rather than face another body.Once he had done this the deaths stopped. Another story is about Chard caves. The caves have been filled in but the tunnels are still there.One of the tunnels runs under the Choughs Hotel. These tunnels are to be explored in September 1985.The start of the tunnels is said to be a secret place.People who worship the devil are said to hold rituals here.
